website_summaries.verdict: These urine ketone test strips are an easy and inexpensive way to monitor fat burning levels to reach desired health outcomes.
pros: Bottle of 125 urine test strips has a shelf life of 2 years (unopened), and of 2 months (once opened)
Easy to read results as color shows in as little as 15 seconds
Backed by a 200% money back guarantee
cons: Must keep bottle air-tight or strips will spoil

customer_reviews.title: Love but hate
customer_reviews.text: I want to give these 5 stars bc they work, but I can’t. After I take a strip out immediately re-seal a package and put it away in my bathroom drawer. Two different packs now the strips have turned completely dark in the package, and then you cannot use them. The entire package, unusable. I have no idea why this keeps happening, I’ve read the directions and follow them. The package is tightly sealed it’s kept away from the light and moisture and yet the entire package of strips still turns dark before they are ever used. Super disappointed ... the ones I used BEFORE they turned bad did work well though
customer_reviews.author: Dabirrs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not 100% sure how accurate they are. I've just started the Keto life a week ago but have lost 4 lbs in 6 days so I'll stick with it. I do plan on purchasing a Keto Mojo in the future as well. I definitely would buy these strips again because they are very affordable compared to Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: They all went bad
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine until one day you go to use them and they are all gray. I tested regularly for a month or 2, then started testing every other week or so. The package was always sealed tightly with the original desiccant package enclosed. They don't last no matter how tight you close the package. Others have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sambucadog

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to read
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can’t tell how accurate these are, the colors are hard to read as they vary slightly. The middle looks like it could be one and the outside looks another. For two days I tested showing trace ketones and then today after eating over double the amount of carbs yesterday when I tested it showed exactly the same results as the previous days.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and helpful for Keto dieters!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased a different brand of ketone strips that turned out to be defective however I heard about the Just Fitter brand from a co-worker who is also doing Keto and not only did they arrive THE NEXT DAY, they were accurate, easy to use and less expensive than the defective brand. Will definitely be purchasing again to help keep me on track as I stick to the Keto framework.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: They do what they're supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: They work fine. My only complaint is that the envelope is too tight. It makes it hard to seal. I moved the sticks to a bottle for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: feli

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The test strips are in a sealed packet that can be closed as a zip loc is. I can only assume they are accurate. This seems to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny's girl

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because it was a low quantity. I don’t use them often enough so they go bad before I use even half of the other brands. My only complaint is that bag is too short. It says to close quickly but I always find myself fiddling to get the strips out of the way of the zipper. Otherwise they seem to work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home or Traveling!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for anyone checking Ketones while traveling or at home. I am type2D and need to check sugar and ketones daily. Product is accurate and simple to use at home or away. Thank you, I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: hard to tell
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little unsure about these strips. I was on a SUPER strict, legit keto diet with perfect macros for over a month and these only ever read low ketones. I'm off the diet now but should I go back on I'm going to buy a different type to compare. I'll update my review when/if that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Hendo

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a few weeks. Could not show any level of Ketosis. Bought the ones from CVS and it showed medium trace in urine. These don't work and they turn grey fast. Which means they are no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: The Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This brand of Keytone strips are the best I've ever used! It's pretty cool to see the colors change on the strip the more you get into Ketosis. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Over All
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is simple to use. They are small and clumsy but over all a decent design.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas 2012

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: i followed the directions. kept the package shut and still the stick all changed to a lavender or purple color about a month after i had them. buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps me to know whether i'm in ketosis or not. I'm usually in the mid purple range. Accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Lee

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Though the strips do test for Ketosis, the ziplock they come in is defective and doesn't ziplock tight so all the strips went bad within 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Justinia Abinette

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The keystone strips are perfect, but the best part to me was the instructions and tips e-mailed to me by this company afterwards. I think that extra step in caring is amazing and the tips really helped!
customer_reviews.author: Cristine

customer_reviews.title: They do work
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were a joke at first but they really do work!.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and not expensive
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these ketone strips to make sure that I stay in Ketosis. The results are much accurate and I like that the cost is not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannee

customer_reviews.title: They really work !
customer_reviews.text: So happy to know that the hard work is finally paying off. I was just about to go out and get some Popeyes because I didn’t feel a change or that I was in Ketosis but I am and I am so excited !
customer_reviews.author: Dalisay

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a sealed re-use bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but says good for three months. Comes in a sealed re-use bag .
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Koutras

customer_reviews.title: Instant results.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! I use one every day to check and make sure I'm staying in ketosis.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The strips are affordable and they work. Glad I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Dependable product
customer_reviews.text: I like the small portable packet and smaller count so they dont go bad.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as described. Im on one meal a day and it definitely hits purple near the end of my fast, and absolutely nothing after eating. The bag is very secure, yet its trouble to open for first time, better to use scissors than trying to pull the seem, then pull some more...then peel..and peel again.. then hope you did not rip the snap zip part. After that though it's easy to open and closes securely. Colors don't seem to match, yet pretty sure it's universal that the darker the better.
customer_reviews.author: Rodri

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This product came fast and has helped me stay on my keto diet. They are cheap enough you can use as many as you need to if you need to see the extra hard work you put in. I have compared these side by side with dip sticks used in hospitals and have not had one that wasn't the same matching result. Only concern is the package is hard to close be very sure that all strips are down inside when you seal if not the air will ruin the strips. Will be buying more when I run out because they are accurate and one of the cheaper ones available.
customer_reviews.author: avidonlineshopper77

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate. Not one strip over a 2 week span showed me in even mild ketosis. I checked my status with a blood meter, and there is no question that I am burning more than enough ketones to have shown up on a strip. Judging from logged dietary intake, I was probably in ketosis during the majority (if not the entirety) of that time. The strips are not worth bothering with. Spare yourself the frustration and get a blood meter.
customer_reviews.author: xM

customer_reviews.title: Strips dont work after 2 weeks...SCAM!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these strips. I had them for less than 3 weeks and the remaining 42 strips already turned grey and stop working. At first I thought it was me not burning ketosis. But I've been very strict with my diet. Then I read other reviews which said the same thing about these strips. A waste of money. I will never purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised as to the packaging, it is a ziplock type bag, but the product works fine. Iprimarily use these if I have a carb heavy day, to make sure I did not come out of ketosis. Nice sharp reading, pad wide enough for a good reading without my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume the accuracy of these strips as I do not have a comparison. I will say they were easy to use and I noticed a gradual change to full Ketosis within 48 hours on a water only fast.
customer_reviews.author: naturenutgirl

customer_reviews.title: Changed color before use
customer_reviews.text: These changed colors after about two weeks. So they didn’t work. The few i did use were fine. I ended up ordering different ones that were in a different container.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Expired and no good
customer_reviews.text: Expired and no good! Used these sticks for 6 weeks before realizing that the dark brown color of the unused sticks is NOT the color it’s supposed to be. 6 weeks!!! Tried and tried to figure out why I couldn’t get into ketosis. Would return but it’s too late.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna C. Henneberger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read results, even for colorblind person ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging could be more user friendly. Color values are really just a darkness determination, which works even for colorblind people, like me. Results seem to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: JoelD

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me. I've been on the keto diet for 2 months and my reading was one away from the highest level. Very quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl129

customer_reviews.title: Great products. Lasts longer than most!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says and lasts longer. I have bought other brands that have gone bad quickly, these don't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. Used this a few times and always said I was in ketosis. Then went to the Dr and said I was not
customer_reviews.author: Burt Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Could have been nice but packaged ruined it all.
customer_reviews.text: The cheap ziplock bag glue came undone and all my strips were waste by getting oxygen to them. All turned grey.
customer_reviews.author: Just Jen

customer_reviews.title: seems to work
customer_reviews.text: The strips are very easy to use and to read.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for diabetics !
customer_reviews.text: The shipping time was great, well packaged and worked well. Thank you again
customer_reviews.author: Isha

product_meta.title: Ketone Keto Urine Test Strips Travel Pack. 50 Strips. Lose Weight, Look & Feel Fabulous on a Low Carb Ketogenic or HCG Diet. Get Your Body Back! Accurately Measure Your Fat Burning Ketosis Levels.
product_meta.description:
Testing ketones are used for different reasons. The top uses are for various diets (ketogenic, paleo, atkins).

Ketone is a chemical produced when there is a shortage of insulin in the blood and the body breaks down body fat for energy.

Ketones in the urine is a sign that your body is using fat for energy instead of using glucose because not enough insulin is available to use glucose for energy.

In a nutritional diet, a person will have to achieve ketosis or nutritional ketosis which will effectively make the body burn fat for fuel instead of sugar from carbohydrates.

The idea is get high ketones if you are trying to achieve ketosis through nutritional dieting. 

For whatever purpose you have for testing ketones, our Just Fitter Ketone Test Strips will be your best guide with its accurate results in seconds.

We believe that accurate and quality results are of the utmost importance. Customer satisfaction is top priority so if our Ketone Test Strips do not meet your expectations, simply let us know and we’ll give you your money back – no questions asked.

Take advantage of our special offers and promotions by ordering today.



Please Note: The Unopened Shelf Life of this Product is 2 Years from the Date of Manufacture. For your convenience and peace of mind, the Lot number, Manufactured and Expiry date of the Test Strips are CLEARLY date stamped on both the bottom of the box and on the label of the bottle. If you have any questions feel free to contact us. Thank you.
feature_bullets: OUR PROMISE TO YOU. High quality Ketone test strips are very sensitive to the environment and changes to temperature. In the unlikely event your Ketone strips EVER stop working or turn gray please contact us and we'll send you a replacement bottle straight away. No ifs, no buts, just awesome customer service.

ACCURATELY MEASURE YOUR KETONE LEVELS AS YOU LOSE WEIGHT. Perfect for keto dieters and also when on a paleo, low carb diet, or fasting. Testing at different times of the day will show you when you’re in Ketosis and burning fat for fuel. Watch the videos below for more information.

MONITOR YOUR FAT BURNING LEVELS AS YOU LOSE WEIGHT. Ketones are the result of your body being in a ketonic state. Indicating your body is burning fat for fuel rather than carbohydrates which can help you achieve your weight loss goals. Measure precise quality results in seconds. In the comfort of the your own home.

ACHIEVE YOUR HEALTH OUTCOMES. Monitoring your ketone levels indicates your body’s level of ketosis. This helps indicate the level of fat burning according to the type of ketogenic diet you're on. Our urinalysis ketone tester strip will serve as guide to help you reach your desired outcome. 100 strips with 25 free. 125 strips per bottle.

KETOSIS QUICK TIP FOR WEIGHT LOSS. Cut Carbs to Reach Ketosis. The fastest way to reach ketosis using your diet is by limiting carbs to 20% (approx 20g) of total calories per day. The body can only store a two-day supply of glucose in the form of glycogen, so after two days of consuming no more than 20 grams of carbohydrates, most people go into lipolysis / ketosis.
